body.p: This day personally came before me the undersigned Justice of the peace,, James Geeper and deposed and said that Joseph. T. Whitlow asked him at Rays cross Roads when the metcalfe Circuit Court would be held and that he told him that it would not be held until the 1st monday in June and that there was a call term in may 18654 Said Geeper also states that the Said Joseph. T. Whitlow had him called as a witness in the case and he told the court that he told the said Whitlow did ask him When the court was to be held and he told him that it would not be held until the first monday in June
Subscribed and Sworn to before me by James Geeper this the 10th day of October 1865
J. B. Terry J. P. M. C
